protein.specific_function: May act as a component of the cytoskeleton or as a chaperone for the reorganization of intermediate filament proteins during terminal differentiation in the lens. Does not seem to have enzymatic activity

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
glutamine family amino acid metabolic process
